name: Cursed
description:
You enter on a mission to find the book of cursed souls, but quickly find out there's more to it than just being an interesting read.

You must explore this forgotten place to find the items to perform the ritual needed to save your life.

Features:
  • Increasing difficulty based on progress

  • Unique points of interest to explore... Just don't linger too long

  • & Enough suspense to give you a good spook
